alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:52PM CDT until September 07 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Garfield County in north central Nebraska... Wheeler County in north central Nebraska... * Until 1030 PM CDT. * At 951 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Bartlett to near Ericson, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Automated Weather Station reported 70 MPH winds in Ord. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Ericson, Buffalo Flats, Cumminsville, Four Corners and Pibel Lake State Recreation Area. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 156. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
